name: Wamys Rewind Resue
description: Welcome to my game, this is my first "complete game" I ever made. It's about a robot named Wamy who tries to save his creator. Unfortunately I didn't implement all the game mechanics and so the game is quite short and not entertaining. In my eyes it's still a success, because with this game jam I achieved my goal of making a game in one week and learned a lot that I can improve on in the next game. Please feel free to give me feedback on this game.
